description: At the start of each creature's turn, if your {RACE_Guardian} has at least 500% of the {STAT_defense} it started the battle with, all creatures {ACTION_cast} [icons,1972]Words of Encouragement on your {RACE_Guardian} and they take damage equal to 100% of their {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_MANIA} debuff's potency. This effect can only happen once per battle.
name: Jubilation
